summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 CRUISER RV SHADOW CRUISER. WHILE OPERATING THE VEHICLE, THERE WAS A GROUNDING FAILURE THAT CAUSED AN ELECTRICAL SHOCK WHEN METAL PARTS WERE CONTACTED ON THE VEHICLE. WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS AT AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC FOR ROUTINE MAINTENANCE, BURNED WIRES WERE LOCATED UNDER THE FRAME OF THE TRAILER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. QUALITY RV SOLUTIONS (133 SN2738, ALVARADO, TX 76009) AND THE MANUFACTURER WERE NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 5,000. THE VIN WAS INVALID.
